desc: Rice feeds more than half of the world's population, yet we still only partly understand the nutrients it contains.

desc: Iran has agreed not to stockpile uranium and to degrade its current stockpiles into fuel, says Oman, describing the move as "a very important breakthrough".

title: EPF declares 6.15% dividend for conventional savings for 2025
desc: SHAH ALAM: The Employees Provident Fund (EPF) has declared a dividend rate of 6.15% for conventional savings for 2025, with the total payout amounting to RM67.1bil.

title: Are password managers safe? Not as much as you think, research shows
desc: Keeping track of password requirements such as a mix of upper and lower case letters, numbers, special characters and more – not only to be remembered but to be changed every few months – is a tall order, not least as platforms urge users to ensure each password is unique.

title: Student, migrant worker and percussionist performing in Chingay 2026 share wishes for Singapore
